Body:
"""Use testing backend for Windows."""
only_test = sys.platform == 'win32' or (os.getenv('TRAVIS', 'false') ==
    'true' and sys.platform == 'linux') and sys.version[0] == '3'
if backend is None:
    backend = 'test' if only_test else 'auto'
if only_test and backend != 'test':
    raise SkipTest('non-testing backend crashes on Windows and Travis Py3k')
mlab.options.backend = backend
